title: JWT Token Payload Schema
description: Schema for JWT token payload issued by Better Auth and validated by FastAPI backend

user_id.description: Unique user identifier from Better Auth

iat.description: Token issued at time (Unix timestamp, optional)

$comment:
Token validation requirements:
1. Signature must be valid (using BETTER_AUTH_SECRET)
2. Token must not be expired (exp > current time)
3. user_id must match URL parameter in API requests
4. email field is informational only (not used for authorization)
